name: Thuellai
description: Thuellai is a huge elemental with a strong cold presence, known for its icy appearance and frigid abilities. It possesses extraordinary agility and resilience, making it a feared combatant.
memorable: Its ability to extinguish flames and freeze water creates a formidable tactical advantage in battle.
goals: To dominate the battlefield through cold-based control, forcing opponents to adapt to its chilling presence.
relations: Can be encountered alongside other elemental creatures or in wintry environments.
environment: Typically found in extremely cold or icy regions, often from the elemental planes.
strengths: High mobility and significant cold-based area-of-effect attacks.
attacks: Three Icy Claw melee attacks dealing slashing and additional cold damage, along with a freezing breath attack in a wide cone.
most_powerful_ability: Freezing Breath, dealing massive cold damage in a large area.
senses: Thuellai has Snowsight, allowing it to see through wintry precipitation without penalty.
skills: It has a decent Perception skill, enhancing its awareness of surroundings.
additional_information: Can ignore the needs for air, food, drink, or sleep
Has a Chilling Presence that damages and exhausts nearby creatures
Resistant to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
Can extinguish unprotected flames within close range
test_queries: cold elemental with powerful icy breath
creature that freezes water and causes exhaustion
